text: Nayo niyo itwara umuyaga yuko ari ikimenyetso kiri imbere y’ugushika kw’imigisha yayo, naho iyo miyaga yikorera ibicu biremereye tukayitwara kw’Isi yapfuye, hanyuma tukayamanura ayo mazi avuye muri ivyo bicu, kuri ivyo duca tunagisha ubwoko bw’ivyamwa vyose, uko rero niko tuzozura abapfuye kugira ngo mushobore kwibuka
